mapper.select: SELECT /* sysCd.getSysCdAdminGroupTotalList */ GRP_CD, CD_ID, CD_NM, DP_SEQ, USE_YN FROM SYS_CD WHERE GRP_CD = #{grpCd} ORDER BY DP_SEQ
SELECT /* sysCd.getSysCdAdminGroupCdList */ CD_ID, CD_NM, DP_SEQ, USE_YN FROM SYS_CD WHERE GRP_CD = #{grpCd} ORDER BY DP_SEQ

SELECT /* sysCd.getSysGroupCdSearchList */ GRP_CD, CD_ID, CD_NM, DP_SEQ, USE_YN FROM SYS_CD
AND GRP_CD = #{grpCd}
AND CD_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{cdId}, ' ', ''), '%')
AND CD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{cdNm}, ' ', ''), '%')
